## validating() function

A class decorator that enables parameter validation and this bindings in all functions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function validating<T extends ValidationTarget>(constructor: T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  constructor | T | The class to be decorated |

<b>Returns:</b>

T
